DataElement.preferredName: Barthel Index Score Assessment Total Score
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric value for an interviewer administered questionnaire consisting of ten items that measure a person's daily functioning specifically in activities of daily living and mobility.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A numerical scale used to compare variables with one another or with some reference number; a number used to select an element of a list, vector, array or other sequence._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability._The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Versioned to change short name and define range as it exists in the original measure.  Created for DCI study in Rave. mc 2/3/17
